content.rendered:
Red Rose Rozana Rice is a long-grained rice variety that has a distinctive nutty taste and fluffy texture – making it ideal for everyday use. It has premium quality white grains that do not break while cooking. From pulao to biryani, you can cook anything with this variety of rice.
It is versatile to the core, from simple steamed rice to pulao and biryani – you can prepare an extensive range of yummy recipes with our Rozana Rice.

Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Suitable for everyday cooking
  • Distinct aroma & flavor
  • Grains that do not stick to each other & break while cooking
  • Long & slender grains
  • Fine texture
